strategic_alerts.description: Emergence of new conflict actor: Military Forces of Israel (2022-) in Palestine, Lebanon. Associated with Explosions/Remote violence, Strategic developments events and 31 fatalities.
Emergence of new conflict actor: Civilians (Palestine) in Palestine. Associated with Explosions/Remote violence, Strategic developments events and 28 fatalities.
Emergence of new conflict actor: Rapid Support Forces in Sudan. Associated with Battles events and 68 fatalities.
Emergence of new conflict actor: Rioters (Bahrain) in Bahrain. Associated with Riots events and 0 fatalities.
Emergence of new conflict actor: EPLC: Awakening of Patriots for the Liberation of Congo (Wazalendo) in Democratic Republic of Congo. Associated with Battles events and 0 fatalities.

events.assoc_actor_2: Darfur Joint Forces/JSAMF: Joint Force of Armed Struggle Movement
events.source: Alhamish Voice; Sudan News Agency; Sudan Tribune; Twitter
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, clashes between RSF, backed by a militia (described as an Arab militia, coded as Darfur Arab militia), and SAF, backed by Darfur Joint Forces/JSAMF, continued in El Fasher (Al Fasher, North Darfur), with RSF artillery shelling and fighter drones. 32 civilians were killed and 17 were wounded.

events.assoc_actor_2: Darfur Joint Forces/JSAMF: Joint Force of Armed Struggle Movement
events.source: Al Mashhad Al Sudani; Alhamish Voice; Beam reports; Darfur 24; HRW; Sudan News Agency; Sudan Tribune; Sudan War Monitor; Sudan War Updates; Twitter; Wakalat; Yale School of Public Health
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, clashes between RSF, backed by a militia (described as an Arab militia, coded as Darfur Arab militia), and SAF, backed by Darfur Joint Forces/JSAMF, continued in Zamzam IDP camp (Al Fasher, North Darfur), with SAF artillery shelling. The Joint Forces repelled the RSF attack and killed an RSF commander. RSF attacked civilians in the camp. 25-45 civilians were killed. Fatalities coded as 26 (1 RSF + 25 civilians).

events.source: Sudan News; Sudan News Agency; Sudan Tribune; Twitter
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, clashes between RSF and Shugara-Berti continued in Umm Keddada (Um Kadadah, North Darfur). RSF overtook the area. RSF killed 10 civilians, including a doctor and patients in the hospital. RSF looted civilians and Starlink networks.

events.source: Palestine News and Information Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes struck a residential home in Khan Yunis - Al Mahattah (Khan Yunis, Gaza Strip), resulting in ten people killed and others injured. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.actor2: Police Forces of Ethiopia (2018-) Amhara State Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Fano claimed to have clashed with Amhara state riot police in Tilili (Guagusa Shikudad, Awi, Amhara), killing 8 and wounding 5 riot police (uncorroborated fatalities). Suspected ENDF soldiers backed the Amhara state riot police and fired a canon from Injibara during the clash.
On 11 April 2025, a FAMa and Wagner patrol set fire to the Fulani village of Kounti-Peulh (Djenne, Mopti). 4 civilians and a person described as a JNIM spotter were also killed. 5 fatalities coded.

events.source: Palestine News and Information Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes struck a group of people on Al Nizaz street in Gaza - Shujaiyya (Gaza City, Gaza Strip), resulting in three people killed and others injured. Also, Israeli artillery shelled residential homes in the same location, resulting in one person killed and others injured, and a fire breaking out in the area, especially on Al Minttar street and in the eastern areas of Gaza - Shujaiyya. Israeli artillery continued to shell the area, casualties unknown. Total fatalities coded as at least 4. These events occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

On 11 April 2025, an IED planted by (likely Al Shabaab due to similar attacks by the group) exploded, after a passenger vehicle drove over it while traveling from Bur-Dacaar, near Geel Gub village (Cadale, Middle Shabelle). 4 civilians were killed and more than 15 were injured.

events.source: Newpress; Palestine News and Information Agency
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes struck a residential home in Al Masoud street in Jabalya El Balad (North Gaza, Gaza Strip), resulting in a number of people killed and others injured [unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3]. Another airstrike struck a residential home in the same location, resulting in injuries. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.actor2: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Santander municipality (coded to Puerto Santander, Amazonas), for the second consecutive day, military forces clashed with members of the Carolina Ramirez FARC Dissident Front in a remote area known as Araracuara. The fighting had begun the evening before (coded separately) and continued overnight, lasting for at least 12 hours. Five dissidents were killed during the course of the entire operation. Once the clashes finished, military forces seized 16 assault rifles, two shotguns, one machine gun, ammunition, and detonators. 5 fatalities split over two days of clashes. 3 fatalities coded to this event.

events.source: Palestine News and Information Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, an Israeli drone struck a group of people at the entrance of Al Mouawia Bin Abi Soufian in Beit Lahiya - Atatra (North Gaza, Gaza Strip), resulting in three people killed and others injured. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.source: Arutz Sheva; Israeli Defense Forces; Twitter
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli military clashed with militants (likely Hamas) in south of the Gaza Strip, coded to Rafah [likely in this location] (Rafah, Gaza Strip), resulting in two militants killed and two Israeli soldiers injured [one due to friendly fire and the other one was seriously injured in battle]. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.source: Ma'an News Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes launched a raid on Abasan al Kabirah (Khan Yunis, Gaza Strip), resulting in two people killed. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.source: Ministry of Defence of Russia; Ministry of Defence of Ukraine
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Russian and Ukrainian military forces clashed near Nova Kruhliakivka, Kharkiv. Russian forces hit (likely by artillery as the most common event) multiple Ukrainian units, including territorial defence (coded to Kupiansk), some near Nova Kruhliakivka, Kharkiv. According to Russian sources, the Ukrainian military lost up to 250 soldiers near Kupiansk, Radkivka, Nova Kruhliakivka, Nove, Yampil, Zarichne, Makiivka [Russian MoD reported 250 fatalities. Coded as 10 fatalities across 7 events. 2 fatalities coded here].

On 11 April 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two armed individuals opened fire from a motorcycle (drive-by) at a woman and her son while they were getting into their car in Colonia Los Robles. Both died as a result. 2 fatalities.

Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), around San Jose Pinula, Guatemala, unidentified attackers shot and killed two men. Their bodies were found around km. 31.5 of the road leading from San Jose Pinula to Palencia, with a message stating that they had been committing crimes and had been punished for it. No further details provided. 2 fatalities.

Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), in La Apartada municipality (Cordoba), two people, a mother and her son, were killed and their bodies were found on a road. Authorities suspect they may have been murdered by Gulf Clan members in retaliation for the killing of one of their high-ranking members and faction leader by security forces in the days prior (coded separately). There is no further information at this point. 2 fatalities.

events.source: Newpress; Palestine News and Information Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, an Israeli drone struck an IDPs' tent in Al Mawasi (Khan Yunis), (Khan Yunis, Gaza Strip), resulting in one person being killed and others injured. Another airstrike struck an IDPs' tent in Al Roni street in the same location, resulting in one person being killed and 13 injuries. These events occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

On 11 April 2025, an Israeli drone struck a group of people at the entrance of Al Mazraa school, east of Deir al Balah coded to Deir al Balah Camp (Deir El Balah, Gaza Strip), casualties unknown. Another airstrike struck a group of people in the same location, resulting in two killed and others injured. Total fatalities coded least 2. These events occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

On 11 April 2025, unknown gunmen in a vehicle shot and killed a former QDW member in Al 'aliliayt neighborhood in Hama city. On the same day, a civilian responsible for recruitment for the former regime was killed in Al Faraia neighborhood in Hama city. 2 fatalities.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Salvador - Barra/Pituba (Bahia), military police officers exchanged fire with BDM members in the Engenho Velho da Federacao neighbourhood. The officers were conducting a routine patrol in the region when they spotted the suspects, who fired against them. An armed clash took place and two suspects were shot and killed. Moreover, two officers were shot and injured. Police seized firearms, ammunition, and drugs portioned for sale. 2 fatalities.

events.actor1: Police Forces of Brazil (2023-) Federal Police
events.assoc_actor_1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police; Police Forces of Brazil (2023-) Civil Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Simoes Filho (Bahia), federal, civil, and military police officers exchanged fire with armed suspects on the BA-526 highway. The officers spotted three suspects, who were in a vehicle, and approached them. The suspects tried to escape and fired against the officers, leading up to an armed clash. During the clash, two suspects were shot and killed. One suspect was wanted for the killing of a federal police officer during a police operation in September 2023 (coded separately). A third suspect escaped. Police seized firearms and ammunition. 2 fatalities.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Salvador - Itapua (Bahia), military police officers exchanged fire with suspected drug traffickers in the Pituacu neighbourhood. The officers were conducting a routine patrol when they spotted the suspects, who fired against them. An armed clash took place and two suspects were shot and killed. Police seized firearms, ammunition and drugs portioned for sale. Likewise, military police officers exchanged fire with drug traffickers in the Cepel neighbourhood. During the clash, an unknown number of people were shot and injured. 2 fatalities.

On 11 April 2025, an unexploded shell from previous shelling by former regime forces, exploded near As-Saan town in Homs countryside, killing a young man, and injuring another while they were working in their farmland. 1 fatality.

events.actor2: Military Forces of Yemen (2022-) Presidential Leadership Council
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, a Houthi IED exploded on Al Anin front at Al Qaidah (Al Anin Front) (Jabal Habashy, Taizz), killing 1 IRG soldier.
On 11 April 2025, an unknown explosion by an unknown armed group took place on Ariha-Mhambal road in Idleb countryside, killing a civilian, and injuring another. 1 fatality.

events.actor1: Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant (ISIL)
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, ISIL members shot and killed a drug dealer who is a former Tribal and Clan Forces member in Eastern Jurdi town in Deir ez Zor countryside. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2025, in Palmas (Tocantins), unknown armed individuals shot and killed a member of a drug trafficking group in the 1206 Sul sector. 1 fatality.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.source: Agencia Brasil; Brasil de Fato; Folha de S. Paulo; G1; SP Agora
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Sao Paulo - Central Zone (Sao Paulo), military police officers shot and killed a street vendor and Senegalese immigrant in the Bras neighborhood. The immigrant went to help a colleague who was working when the police tried to collect his merchandise. Surrounded by military police, he used a iron bar against an officer and was shot in the abdomen and died in hospital. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Rio de Janeiro - West Zone (Rio de Janeiro), unidentified armed men killed a militia man (likely Catiri militia due to the location) in the Catiri community, in the Bangu neighborhood. The militiaman was killed while extorting shopkeepers. Perpetrators unknown. 1 fatality.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Niteroi - North (Rio de Janeiro), military police exchanged fire with drug traffickers during a police operation in the Morro do Castro community, in the Tenente Jardim neighborhood. During the shooting, the agents shot and killed a local drug trafficker leader and injured another suspect. Other suspects fled into a wooded area. The police seized a 7.62 calibre FAL rifle, five grenades, a drone, a rifle magazine, and narcotics, including a ball of cocaine, and a tablet of marijuana. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Teresina (Piaui), residents lynched a suspect of theft in the Vermelha neighbourhood. The group caught and lynched the suspect after he shot and injured a woman during a theft. A second man, who also participated in the robbery, managed to escape. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Nova Floresta (Paraiba), unidentified armed suspects shot and killed a man. The suspects fired against the victim, who had a police record (charges unspecified), and escaped immediately. Portions of drugs were found at the victim's house, and he had an unclear involvement with criminal groups (unspecified). Police investigates if the attack was motivated by drug trafficking disputes. The authorship and motivations for the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Joao Pessoa (Paraiba), an unidentified armed suspect shot a couple in a drive-by shooting in the Portal do Sol neighbourhood. The suspect was on a motorcycle when he fired against the couple, who was also on a vehicle. The suspect escaped, and drugs were found with the victims. A man was shot and killed and a woman was injured. The authorship and motivations for the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in the rural area of Mocajuba municipality (Para), armed individuals exchanged fire with military police during an operation in the Ramal do Pantoja region. One officer was killed. 1 fatality.

events.actor1: Military Forces of Brazil (2023-) Military Police
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Maceio (Alagoas), military police officers exchanged fire with a CV member in the Cidade Universitaria neighbourhood. The officers conducted an operation to locate and arrest the suspect, who was wanted for drug trafficking charges. The suspect resisted to the officers' approach and fired against them, leading up to an armed clash. During the clash, he was shot and killed. Police seized a firearm and ammunition. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, a confrontation which led to armed clash with machine guns among unknown gunmen in Jizeh town in Dara countryside over an unknown dispute, resulted in killing a young man. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Puerto Cabello (Carabobo), the police forces of Carabobo clashed with a member of the Eufemia gang in the neighborhood Brisas del Mar in the Santa Cruz sector, Goaigoaza parish. He was hiding from the security forces of de Juan Jose Mora municipality, who were investigating him for his alleged participation in homicide and extortion. He was taken to the hospital, where he died. Authorities seized a firearm and a grenade. 1 fatality.

events.actor2: AQAP: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
events.source: Aden al Ghad; Al Mashhad Al Yemeni - Pro-IRG; Yemen Window
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, an unidentified armed man shot and killed a AQAP leader of Saudi nationality in Wadi Abidah region (Marib, Marib). The gunman fled to an unknown location.

On 11 April 2025, unknown gunmen on a motorbike shot and seriously injured a man accused of collaborating with the former regime, and killed one of his escorts, in addition to injuring another in Tall Awdat Harb town in Al Hasakeh countryside. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, unknown masked gunmen stopped a former school manager at a temporary checkpoint on Al Waha road on the outskirts of As-Safira town in Aleppo countryside, and shot and killed him. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2025, a landmine from previous clashes planted by unknown gunmen exploded near the entrance of Bsanqul town in Idleb countryside, killing a man, and injuring another. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2025, a landmine from previous clashes planted by unknown gunmen exploded in a vehicle in Sabka badia in Ar Raqqa countryside, killing a man. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a man walking on the street together with an acquaintance (drive-by). The man died as a result and the second victim was injured. Suspectedly, the attack is related to extortions. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and a decapitated head was found inside a drainage canal in Colonia El Florido. 1 fatality.
Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), near Tiradores, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on the San Jose-Huajumbaro highway. 1 fatality.
Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, a person was killed and the human remains were found inside a suitcase in Colonia El Sol. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men descended from a vehicle and shot a man inside his truck outside a kindergarten in Colonia Haciendas de Echeveste in front of his daughter. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two armed individuals opened fire and killed a man in Colonia 12 de diciembre. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed individuals arrived at a home and shot a mechanic to death in his garage where he worked in Colonia Diaz Ordaz. 1 fatality.

events.admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, in Tuxpan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a regional agrarian leader of he National Peasant Confederation (CNC) in El Alamo inside his office. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in San Miguel Petapa, Guatemala, unidentified armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a man in sector 3 of Villa Hosa 1, zone 7 (drive-by). No motivation for the attack was stated. 1 fatality.

Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), in Comayaguela, Francisco Morazan, a young man was killed and his body was found with severe signs of violence, partially stuffed into a sack and tied with electrical cables in the Las Torres neighborhood. This is the second body found in the area in less than two weeks. The attack is suspected to be linked to territorial disputes between youth gangs. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2025, in Curimon (Valparaiso), unidentified residents detained a man they accused of a string of robberies and held him until police arrived to arrest him. The suspected thief sustained unspecified injuries during the detention since police arranged to have these registered at San Camilo hospital. Upon arrival at the hospital, the suspected thief was found to be dead, although the precise cause of death was unclear. 1 fatality.

events.actor2: Police Forces of Nigeria (2023-) NSCDC: Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, an unidentified armed group opened fire and killed 1 NSCDC officer and injured 3 others in the Igbomoturu community (Southern Ijaw, Bayelsa). The officers were returning from an operation when they came under attack in the community.

events.source: Ma'an News Agency; Palestine News and Information Agency; Quds News Network
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes struck an IDPs' tent in the vicinity of Nasr Medical Complex in Khan Yunis (Khan Yunis, Gaza Strip), resulting in one person being killed. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

On 11 April 2025, an Israeli drone struck Al Mawasi (Rafah), (Rafah, Gaza Strip), resulting in one person being killed and others injured. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

Around 11 April 2025 (as reported), a mob attacked and killed 1 person on Ukaonu Street near NEPA in Abia (Aba South, Abia) for manslaughter. The victim had a misunderstanding with another man, and in the process, he struck the man with a stone, resulting in death.

events.source: Quds News Network; Times of Israel
events.notes: On 11 April 2025, Israeli warplanes struck a group of people west of Rafah coded to Tal as Sultan (Rafah, Gaza Strip), resulting in one person being killed and others injured. The IDF stated that they targeted a militant [Unidentified Armed Group and likely in this location]. Israeli warplanes struck Al Shakoush area northwest of Rafah, casualties unknown. Total fatalities coded at least 1. This event occurred following the expiration of the first phase of the ceasefire.

events.source: Al Jazeera; Al Mashhad Al Sudani; Al Rakoba; Al Rakoba News; Al Sudani; Al Taghyeer (Sudan); Al Tayar (Sudan); Alhamish Voice; Ayin Network; Darfur 24; Darfur Victims Support Organization; ECHO; Independent; Independent (United Kingdom); IOM; Madameek; Radio Dabanga; Radio Tamazuj; Sudan News; Sudan News Agency; Sudan Tribune; Wakalat
events.notes: Displacement: Around 11 April 2025 (from 5 - 11 April), 90-917 households were displaced in Zamzam IDP camp (Al Fasher, North Darfur) and El Fasher. The SFA called civilians on 5 April to evict El Fasher city, Aboja, Abu Shouk, and Zamzam IDP camps to evict the military operations area through safe corridors to be displaced to SFA controlled area in Korma, and SLM/A-Nur in Tawila, and claimed 8,500 households responded to their call between 5-11 April. SLM/A-Nur accused INGOs of collaborating with SFA. The IDPs Coordination rejected the call. SAF claimed the SFA published a video of escorting civilians in the Shagarah area, not in the Zamzam IDP camp.
